Articles.Content:
After recieving the update you havn't made me rage you havn't broken the game, you have expanded on a really good base.

So again Thanks for doing a great job.
New Science Archives are really impressive!!! Thanks. Great job.
Not only thanks for this great release, but also for coming on forums and discussing with players, it really feels great to see that developers care about the community.
Indeed! I've noticed Harvester's been around the forum pretty actively the past few days, probably because he's worried people are upset. Which is silly, KSP is sick.
